about_the_game:
■ What is Gekko?

Gekko is the stage where swords, machines and ponytails appear in modern society.

A school romantic comedy visual novel that depicts an exciting love pattern with five heroines.

This is the third installment in the Gekko series, and it tells the story of “Yurihime,” the protagonist's older sister and teacher.

■ Story

Time is modern.

The largest machine product company "Imperial Heavy Industries"

Monopolize the share of "Automata"

Demand was spreading not only to industry but also to ordinary households.

High school student "Yuto" who attends "Seioh High School"

Unfortunately, he gets caught up in an automata runaway incident, but after a short break, the third-generation automata "Nova" saves his life.

The hideout was taken to "Nova" as it was, and "Yuto" was assigned a serious task.

―――― Become a lover with 5 school idols to defeat "Mugen Tukuyomi".

"Yuto" is his buddy "Nova",

He started the operation to become a heroine and a lover with the operation staff "Kageyama".

This time the target is.

Sometimes the protagonist's sister, sometimes a teacher at the Holy Imperial Academy, sometimes a bartender,

And in reality, she is “Yurihime”, the operator of ...... “Swordbreaker Benihomura”.

How did she, with her many faces, come to be entrusted with the Swordbreaker?

This is an episode of a sister and brother that no one knows, which is connected to the secret of the birth of the main character, Yuto.

■ Features

・ Unique and cute characters

・ A story of laughter, tears, and excitement

・School battle romantic comedy in which students fight each other with swords

・ Visual novel that can be enjoyed casually without choice

・ Play time 4-5 hours

・ Only mouse operation is supported

content_descriptors.notes:
Suggestive sexual dialogue
Animated blood
Language
Partial Nudity

detailed_description:
■ What is Gekko?

Gekko is the stage where swords, machines and ponytails appear in modern society.

A school romantic comedy visual novel that depicts an exciting love pattern with five heroines.

This is the third installment in the Gekko series, and it tells the story of “Yurihime,” the protagonist's older sister and teacher.

■ Story

Time is modern.

The largest machine product company "Imperial Heavy Industries"

Monopolize the share of "Automata"

Demand was spreading not only to industry but also to ordinary households.

High school student "Yuto" who attends "Seioh High School"

Unfortunately, he gets caught up in an automata runaway incident, but after a short break, the third-generation automata "Nova" saves his life.

The hideout was taken to "Nova" as it was, and "Yuto" was assigned a serious task.

―――― Become a lover with 5 school idols to defeat "Mugen Tukuyomi".

"Yuto" is his buddy "Nova",

He started the operation to become a heroine and a lover with the operation staff "Kageyama".

This time the target is.

Sometimes the protagonist's sister, sometimes a teacher at the Holy Imperial Academy, sometimes a bartender,

And in reality, she is “Yurihime”, the operator of ...... “Swordbreaker Benihomura”.

How did she, with her many faces, come to be entrusted with the Swordbreaker?

This is an episode of a sister and brother that no one knows, which is connected to the secret of the birth of the main character, Yuto.

■ Features

・ Unique and cute characters

・ A story of laughter, tears, and excitement

・School battle romantic comedy in which students fight each other with swords

・ Visual novel that can be enjoyed casually without choice

・ Play time 4-5 hours

・ Only mouse operation is supported

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4160
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

In this work, you can enjoy the love story of “Yurihime,” the protagonist's older sister and teacher.
